attributes.action: Raise more awareness of the safety for asylum seekers coming from Syria.
attributes.additional_details: We are students  from High Tunstall College Of Science in Hartlepool and for our citizenship coursework we are trying to raise more awareness for the safety of Asylum Seekers in Syria. We have recently been using up our own time to gather donations to take along with us to a group in Hartlepool which help Asylum Seekers. References can be made from the following teachers: Mr John Leary and Mr Matthew Thompson. Contact the school to be in contact with collagues.
attributes.background: Syria currently has been going through a very traumatising civil war, many syrians have been coming over to sevreal different countries such as the UK to flee for safety innocent childen and adults have unfourtanetly been killed causing heartache throughout the country.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
